boardgame.name: La Granja: No Siesta
La Granja: No Siesta – Das Würfelspiel
boardgame.description: La Granja: No Siesta is a standalone dice game following up the boardgame La Granja._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The players need to collect resources to cross them off on their scoring sheet in order to get the most victory points. They can hire helpers to use their special effects. They build a barn to store goods and sometimes they need to have a little time off and have a Siesta!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The dice game singles out the dice mechanism from the boardgame and transfers it into a much lighter game. Every round the players roll the dice and draft them until everybody has at least three dice to score._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Once a player completes the siesta track the game comes to an end. Whoever collected resources in the most effective way will win the game!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: #82: Randowriters! Welcome To… (on tap) plus seven more!
19. Devon Dice Dreaming to Essen trip 2016, Top 10 wants to Buys
Episode 39 - Our Most Anticipated Games in 2017
Episode 69 - No Siestas for Andreas _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Ode._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; Odendahl
Episode 8 - Brick and Mortar vs. Online Stores
La Granja: No Siesta - Designed by Ode.
The Game Pit Podcast: Episode 73 - Spiel _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;16 Treasure Hunt Part 3
The Good The Board and Jon and Nate plus…10: Episode 97″Nate’s top 10 of 2016″

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable
